actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that the dissemination of any advertisement for goods or services by a retailer which does not include a consumer information telephone number shall be an unfair or deceptive act or practice.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Trade Commission Act to make it an unfair or deceptive act or practice for any retailer to disseminate any advertisement for goods or services which does not include a consumer information telephone number.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to provide that the dissemination of any advertisement for goods or services by a retailer which does not include a consumer information telephone number shall be an unfair or deceptive act or practice.
